loginSuccessAddCode: Pour accéder à votre compte, vous avez reçu un code de sécurité par mail. C'est bien non ? Saisissez le ci-dessous et validez :

errors.userNotFound: A user with this email could not be found.
errors.notCompleteCode: You must fill in the entire code
errors.validuser: At no time did you create an account to validate it and be able to vote. That's just wrong !
errors.validcode: Your code is not correct. That's not good !
errors.nameAlreadyExist: A user already exists with the name
errors.emailAlreadyExist: A user already exists with this email
errors.needLoginOrSignupToVote: Sorry. To vote, you must login or create an account.
errors.serverError: Sorry. There must be something wrong with our system. It's not right! Please contact us : https://localhost:4200/contact

proposition.user: We can suggest the following username :

success.userValidate: Your account is validated. Now log in with your chosen email address and password. That's great !
success.userValidateCode: Perfect. For security reasons, we have sent you a code by email to enter below and it will be fine !

things.textPresentThings: This page gives you access to all the lists of things created and existing within Cbcpb. Feel free to view the results by clicking on the item(s) you're interested in. Then vote whether you like them or not, to help them evolve. In any case, by voting, you'll receive notifications about the various things you've given your opinion on.
things.textThingGoodExplain: - 'Good' (more people think it's right) represented by
things.textThingNotGoodExplain: - 'Bad' (more people think it's bad) represented by
things.textThingIdenticalExplain: - 'Identical' ( as many people think it's either good or not good ) represented by
things.textLastTenThings: Please find below the last 10 things created (click on them to see the details) :
things.textLastTenGoodThings: Please find below the last 10 'well' created things (click on them to see the details) :
things.textLastTenNotGoodThings: Please find below the last 10 things 'not well' created (click on them to see details) :
things.textLastTenIdenticalThings: Please find below the last 10 'identical' things created (click on them to see details) :
things.textNothingThings: No good or bad things, feel free to add more. If you like, click on
things.textNothingGoodThings: No 'good' stuff, feel free to add more. If you like, click on
things.textNothingIdenticalThings: No 'identical' things, so feel free to add more. If you like, click on
things.textSeeAllThings: Please find below all the things (click on them to see the details) :
things.textSeeAllGoodThings: Please find below all the 'good' things (click on them to see details) :
things.textSeeAllNotGoodThings: Please find below all the 'not good' things (click on them to see details) :
things.textSeeAllIdenticalThings: Please find below all 'identical' things (click on them to see details) :
things.textSeeAllMyThings: Please find below all your things (click on them to see the details) :
things.myThingsText: My proposals for a general vote
things.myPrivateThingsText: My proposals for a private vote
things.textSeeAllPersonalGeneralThings: Please find below all your suggested items (click on them to see details) :
things.textSeeAllPersonalPrivateThings: Please find below all your proposed private things (click on them to see details):

vote.votealreadytext: You cannot vote because you have already done so. That's not good !
vote.votenotyettext: Are you sure about your choice? Please note that this vote will remain open for as long as its creator decides.
vote.votefinishsuccess: You have now voted ! If you think you made a mistake, you can't change your mind, but maybe that's just as well. In short, it's either good or it's not.
vote.votefinishnotsuccess: Um... Sorry, you weren't able to vote. That's not good for us. What a shame. Please don't hesitate to contact us.

things.textThingInAnyCase: in any case, whether it is
things.textThingSeeOtherVotes: to see the votes by continent and even by country that voted, and to see that it may be different in other places.
things.textThingIA: You can even click to find out what AI thinks. Be careful, though, because it may be wrong and not match your personal opinion. Or it may help you decide how to vote.
things.textThatsGoodOrNot: Is it good or is it not good
things.textNoVote: No votes yet. Feel free to vote and share your opinion. What's more, voting is anonymous.

errorMessageAccessProfilLogin: You need to login to access your profil.
errorMessageAccessCreateLogin: You need to login to create a new thing.
errorMessageAccessValid: You must validate your account via the email you received. Click here to validate your account :

creating-things.thingToVoteText: Title of the item to be voted on
creating-things.placeHolderThingText: Putting a simple title like 'Thing' will have the effect of saying 'Is Thing good or bad ?
creating-things.descriptionThingToVoteText: Description of the item you want a vote on
creating-things.placeHolderDescriptionThingText: A description can sometimes be helpful in understanding why this vote was taken, but it is not compulsory.
creating-things.needToChoosePrivateText: I need to make a private vote

codeSecurity.codeTitleCreation: Please enter your code sent by email to validate your account
codeSecurity.codeTitleLogin: Please enter the code you received by e-mail to login
codeSecurity.codeExplainCreation: Please note! This code is valid for 15 minutes only. After this time, you will need to create a new account, as this one will be deleted. This code is strictly personal and must never be communicated.
